title: LC3 Style Grand Confort Armchair - Special Edition
body: Our Special Edition Le Corbusier LC3 Style chair is iconic, cubic perfection. The foam cushions are Dacron-wrapped, just like the original. This makes them fuller more comfortable and prevents sagging. Cushions are upholstered in aniline Italian leather with a cotton/polyester mix fabric giving the internal panels a unique design feature plus added comfort. Other leather colours available, discuss with customer support. The result. A spectacular chair.
